name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

description.en: Informatics is handled and viewed as a separate subject in the Estonian national curriculum and as a subject integrated to other lessons. Learner's digital competence is developed as a capability of using digital technology and to evaluate how relevant and trustworthy used digital devices are. In the course, informatics is considered and examined as a subject in Estonian national curricula both as a standalone subject and integrated with other subjects. An overview of informatics-related studies in schools and topics covered within informatics education is provided: programming, robotics, multimedia, information retrieval, and internet security.
description.et: Aines Informaatika koolis käsitletakse ja vaadeldakse informaatikat kui õppeainet Eesti riiklikes õppekavades nii eraldi õppeainena kui lõimituna teiste õppeainetega. Antakse ülevaade informaatika-alastest uuringutest koolis ja informaatika õppe raames käsitletavatest teemadest: programmeerimine, robootika, multimeedia, infootsing ja internetiturvalisus.

objectives.en: Goal of the course is to give the participants an overview of the informatics at school.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda osalejatele ülevaade informaatika käsitlemisest üldhariduskoolides.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has passed this course:
* knows and is capable of naming the regulations of informatics according to the national curricula;
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab nimetada informaatika aine nõudeid riiklikus õppekavas;

learning_outcomes.en: * knows and is able to describe the content of informatics taught at school;
learning_outcomes.et: * kirjeldab informaatika õpetamise erinevaid võimalikke viise, õpisisu ja õpitulemusi üldhariduskoolis;

learning_outcomes.en: * is capable of doing reasonable choice to study becoming informatics teacher;
learning_outcomes.et: * on suuteline tegema mõtestatud valiku informaatikaõpetajaks õppimise suhtes;
